name: @freesewing/florent
description: Freesewing pattern for a flat cap
author: Joost De Cock <joost@decock.org> (https://github.com/joostdecock)

scripts.patch: npm version patch -m ':bookmark: v%s' && npm run build
scripts.minor: npm version minor -m ':bookmark: v%s' && npm run build
scripts.major: npm version major -m ':bookmark: v%s' && npm run build
scripts.watch: nodemon -w src -w config --exec 'rollup -c rollup.js -o dist/browser.js -f iife -m true -n freesewing_patterns_florent --footer "freesewing.patterns.florent = freesewing_patterns_florent;"'
scripts.browserbuild: rollup -c rollup.js -o dist/browser.js -f iife -m true -n freesewing_patterns_florent --footer 'freesewing.patterns.florent = freesewing_patterns_florent;'
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run browserbuild && npm run nodebuild && npm run modulebuild
